page.title: 20POPULATION/SLAUGHAM
page.content: The population of Slaugham has not changed very much in the last thirty years as it is in a conservation area and no new houses can be built. The original residents of Slaugham, now retired,were mainly agricultural workers. This is not so today because of new technology. Newer residents have been attracted by the peace. Some people only live in Slaugham during holidays and weekends. A lot of non residents visit Slaugham's lakes and pub at weekends. This causes a parking problem in the village. { {This survey was carried out by 12 year {old pupils at the Desmond Anderson {Middle School, Tilgate, Crawley,W.Sx. {during the Summer Term 1985. We would {like to thank all the residents of {Slaugham, Staplefield and Warninglid {for all their help. }
